title: What are the best business networking websites? - Quora

response.answer_text: With a rapidly growing world, people are more interested in developing their own business and become an entrepreneur. Every start-up needs some backup and to create a professional contact for business is not so easy. Therefore, people have developed business networking websites, where you can find out professional connections and events also to meet with new business persons. There are many websites that make you coordinate directly with professionals and also give opportunities to grow. Below is the list of best business networking websites of San Diego: San Diego East County Chamber of Commerce “The Voice of the Business Community for San Diego County” It is one of the trusted networking groups of San Diego, having information about business and the communities of San Diego East County. Their mission is to improve business opportunities, public policy, and business relationships throughout San Diego County. Meetup It is a platform for finding and building local communities. You can meet new people, learn new things, find support and pursue your passion by joining the meetup. They also arrange professional meetups for all type of businesses. Here you can explore yourself with new business persons and share and gain knowledge. San Diego Business Networking Group Their mission is to bring together local business professionals and share business referrals, with collaborating and discussing how they can give back to the San Diego community in philanthropic and meaningful ways. 6 Degrees They have a wide range of events for everyone. If you are a social butterfly, there is a monthly event named monthly happy hours to provide an opportunity to meet and mingle. For higher-level executive or CEO willing to meet minded individuals and share business opportunities, they have exclusive events Cigar and Scotch mixers every other month. It is one of the leading Business Networking Group of San Diego. SCORE: San Diego It is an organization run by volunteers under the U.S Small Business Administration (SBA) and it is a perfect fit for entrepreneurs. They are a volunteer, non-profit organization whose mission is to promote the success of small business in both San Diego and Imperial Counties. SCORE mentors provide free and confidential business assistance to both prospective entrepreneurs and existing small business owners.

ConnectFirms is an international business Networking and promotional platform where you can build your own business community by connecting or following the companies that of your interest area globally. Once you are connected with your targeted prospects, you can promote your company using text, images, videos and web links. You can get real time updates of the companies in your network with the help of News feed system .You can also get updated from companies which are not in your network using post/promotion page. Internal Messaging system helps you to communicate with your prospects and build the trust. Also, with the help of social Media features you can share posts onto multiple social networking sites like LinkedIn, Facebook, twitter, google +, and use hashtags to rank higher up in the search engine. If you are looking to build your own business community and get maximum returns on each dollar you spend, please sign up on www.connectfirms.com and start promoting your business.
